column5: MLNX So its pretty much at the price NVDA announced the deal so I guess market has made its mind that the deal is not happening Granted price was up at this level in hope of deal before NVDA announced so guess there is lot more downside to go
Today is not the day to buy the weakness into semis in my opinion They lead us up and they lead us down Im prepped to buy some of the big losers like LRCX MLNX SOXL INTC

MLNX JimCramer did a nice interview of Jensen Huang NVDA CEO who said Chinese will support the deal going through That means there is great value between cash takeout price of 125 and current price of 11085 Thats a return of 1132 Sellers are not thinking reacting in fear Watch the video financeyahoocomvideochi
MLNX analysts on Estimize are expecting 1409 YoY revenue growth for Q2 down from 2160 in Q1 Reporting 0716 AMCestimizecomintromlnxcha
